bike.description: Alpha Red Aluminum w/internally and externally relieved head tube, hydroformed bi-axial down tube and top tube, wishbone seatstay, hydroformed chainstays, forged and relieved disc ready dropouts

components.description: Shimano M525 SL rear hub, Bontrager sealed front hub; Bontrager SSR, 32-hole welded rims w/eyelets
Bontrager Race OS flat bar, 31.6mm, 620mm width
VP-A58ACT-TK, 1 1/8" w/alloy cups, semi-cartridge bearings, sealed
Avid Juicy 5, hydraulic disc; 185mm front rotor, 160mm rear rotor
